room_title: Escape room "Gearwork’s Manor" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
room_description: Doctor Gearwork’s life work has been spent studying the balance of the universe and keeping harmony with opposites. Through his research, Gearwork discovered that on certain nights, the balance of the universe would shift towards evil. Monsters would roam the earth, humans would turn to zombies, and evil would reign. During one particularly long night of relentless research, Dr. Gearwork disappeared! What had he discovered? Your team is tasked to take over, complete his work, and discover the mystery of maintaining the balance of the universe. Will your team succeed in saving the world?
